description.en: Introduction to Digital Marketing in Tourism. PESO model as a framework applied in digital marketing activities. Content marketing for tourism and wellness brands ("owned" media). Mobile marketing, messengers and chantbota as effective channels for tourism and wellness communication. Online promotion and social media ("shared media"). User-generated content and virality in digital marketing. Influencer marketing and working with social crowds ("earned" media). SEO, SEM, SMM and Display advertising ("paid" media).
description.et: Sissejuhatus teemasse. Mis on digiturundus? PESO mudel ja selle rakendamine turundustegevustes. Turismi ja heaolubrändide sisuturundus. Erinevad tänapäevased digiturunduskanalid. Veebiturundus ja sotsiaalmeedia. Kasutajate loodud infosisu ja digiturunduse viraalsus. Influencer marketing ja töö sotsiaalsete gruppidega. SEO, SEM, SMM tähendus ja roll digiturunduses.

objectives.en: This course aims to develop students' understanding of the key concepts, principles and channels of digital marketing that will be relevant for professionals working in the spa and wellness industry.
objectives.et: Kursuse eesmärk on anda põhjalik arusaam digitaalse turunduse võtmekontseptsioonidest, printsiipidest ja kanalitest, mis on nõutud ja vajalikud heaolutööstuses.

learning_outcomes.en: Upon the completion of the course the student:
1) understands the role of digital marketing in service industries
2) knows the roles of stakeholders involved in various digital marketing processes
learning_outcomes.et: 2) teab erinevaid sidusrühmi ja nende rolle, mis on kaasatud digiturunduse protsessidesse

learning_outcomes.en: 3) can apply the core digital marketing principles in practice and run digital marketing campaigns
learning_outcomes.et: 3) oskab rakendada digiturunduse printsiipe praktikas ja läbi viia digiturunduskampaaniaid

learning_outcomes.en: 4) can communicate to stakeholders the latest digital marketing strategies designed for the spa and wellness industries
learning_outcomes.et: 4) oskab tutvustada ja selgitada sidusrühmadele heaolu- ja spaavaldkonna digiturunduse trende ja strateegiaid

learning_outcomes.en: 5) can think critically and strengthen the decision-making and argumentation skills based on the proposed digital marketing ideas
learning_outcomes.et: 5) oskab kriitiliselt analüüsida ja põhjendada digiturundusideid

independent_work.en:
1. Individual written assignment: each student creates a digital marketing campaign for a product or service. The written assignment should cover all the types of online media and digital marketing technologies covered during the course. The detailed requirements for the written assignment will be presented during the introductory lecture.

2. Group presentation: students will be asked to form in groups and do an oral presentation in class. The list of topics and guidelines for presentations will be predetermined by the lecturer and presented during the introductory session.
